page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: Our thanks go to the following people for their valuable contribution The teachers and fourth year pupils of{Arundel Court Middle School, Portsmouth including Darren Sole, Mark Hopwood and Vincent Carpenter The 2nd., 3rd., and 4th. Year children of{Newtown C.E. Primary {School, Gosport. Individual contributions from: Mr. Geoff. Jones _ Deputy Head of Newtown Primary School Mr Tony Green _ Deputy Head of Arundel Court Middle School Mr Mark Wildman _ Newtown Pri. School Mrs Heather Sinclair and her family Mrs Pat Harrop and her family Mrs Brenda Powell and her family Mrs Ann O'Gorman Mrs Kath Habens Merelyn Bishop
